title: Macadamia nut and white chocolate cookies
ingredients: ['225g butter, softened', '165g light soft brown sugar', '100g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon almond flavouring', '300g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '130g coarsely chopped macadamia nuts', '180g coarsely chopped white chocolate']
